channel.title: Life on Puk's place .｡.:*☆

item.title: Life
item.description:
Hiiiiiiiiiiiiiii whoever’s reading!

I got sick of my good ol site again. Which means we’re restarting the classic ~2 year cycle!

I’m trying Hugo this time. I’m hoping it’ll make making site changes a lot easier because I love a good Markdown.

Anyways. I’m really enjoying doing Mlem stuff right now. I think the lack of time I have to do all the cool things I want to do is making me feel old. Adulthood stinks.
